languages.text: {n}Паскаль величественно продолжает слова Медного шепота:{/n} "Эсхатос был совершенным оружием против оскверненных врагами творений Омниссии... но и против верных его слуг. Его распространение могло принести победу Империуму, а могло уничтожить его. Эсхатос мог положить конец Адептус Механикус, ведь был совершенным ответом на силу церкви Бога-Машины. Было бы это благом или проклятьем?"

{n}Pasqal continues Brasswhisper's speech in a lofty tone:{/n} "Eschatos was the perfect weapon against creations of the Omnissiah that had been corrupted by enemies... but also against His faithful servants. Its spread could bring victory to the Imperium, or it could destroy it. Eschatos could spell the end of the Adeptus Mechanicus, for it was the perfect answer to the power wielded by the Cult of the Machine God. Was it a blessing or a curse?"
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль величественно продолжает слова Медного шепота:{/n} "Эсхатос был совершенным оружием против оскверненных врагами творений Омниссии... но и против верных его слуг. Его распространение могло принести победу Империуму, а могло уничтожить его. Эсхатос мог положить конец Адептус Механикус, ведь был совершенным ответом на силу церкви Бога-Машины. Было бы это благом или проклятьем?"

Eschatos could spell the end of the Adeptus Mechanicus, for it was the perfect answer to the power wielded by the Church of the Machine God. Was it a blessing or a curse?"

languages.text: {n}パスカルがブラスウィスパーに続けて高慢な口調で語る。{/n}「エスカトは敵の手に落ちた万機神の創造物に対抗する、完璧な兵器だった…だが、それは忠実な従者に対しても作用した。普及すれば帝国に勝利をもたらすか、滅ぼすか。エスカトは帝国技術局の終わりの象徴になりかねない。機械神の教団が扱う力に対し、完璧な回答を出すからだ。それは恩寵だろうか、呪いだろうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal continues Brasswhisper's speech in a lofty tone:{/n} "Eschatos was the perfect weapon against creations of the Omnissiah that had been corrupted by enemies... but also against His faithful servants. Its spread could bring victory to the Imperium, or it could destroy it. Eschatos could spell the end of the Adeptus Mechanicus, for it was the perfect answer to the power wielded by the Cult of the Machine God. Was it a blessing or a curse?"

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルがブラスウィスパーに続けて高慢な口調で語る。{/n}「エスカトは敵の手に落ちた万機神の創造物に対抗する、完璧な兵器だった…だが、それは忠実な従者に対しても作用した。普及すれば帝国に勝利をもたらすか、滅ぼすか。エスカトは帝国技術局の終わりの象徴になりかねない。機械神の教団が扱う力に対し、完璧な回答を出すからだ。それは恩寵だろうか、呪いだろうか？」

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡以高傲的语气，顺着铜语的话说道。{/n}“在对付被敌人腐化的欧姆尼塞亚造物时，终焉审判是一把完美的武器……但它也同样可以用来攻击祂虔诚的仆人。这种武器可以为帝国带来胜利，也可能会毁灭帝国。终焉审判是万机之神的信徒祈盼的完美力量，但也可能会导致机械修会的终结。因此，它究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal continues Brasswhisper's speech in a lofty tone:{/n} "Eschatos was the perfect weapon against creations of the Omnissiah that had been corrupted by enemies... but also against His faithful servants. Its spread could bring victory to the Imperium, or it could destroy it. Eschatos could spell the end of the Adeptus Mechanicus, for it was the perfect answer to the power wielded by the Cult of the Machine God. Was it a blessing or a curse?"

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡以高傲的语气，顺着铜语的话说道。{/n}“在对付被敌人腐化的欧姆尼塞亚造物时，终焉审判是一把完美的武器……但它也同样可以用来攻击祂虔诚的仆人。这种武器可以为帝国带来胜利，也可能会毁灭帝国。终焉审判是万机之神的信徒祈盼的完美力量，但也可能会导致机械修会的终结。因此，它究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？”

languages.text: {n}Pasqal poursuit sur un ton altier.{/n} « Eschatos était l'arme idéale contre les créations de l'Omnimessie corrompues par nos ennemis... mais également contre Ses fidèles serviteurs. Son utilisation aurait tout aussi bien pu apporter la victoire à l'Imperium que le détruire. Eschatos pouvait signer la fin de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, car il pouvait parfaitement contrecarrer la puissance du culte du Dieu-Machine. Mais était-ce une bénédiction ou une malédiction ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal continues Brasswhisper's speech in a lofty tone:{/n} "Eschatos was the perfect weapon against creations of the Omnissiah that had been corrupted by enemies... but also against His faithful servants. Its spread could bring victory to the Imperium, or it could destroy it. Eschatos could spell the end of the Adeptus Mechanicus, for it was the perfect answer to the power wielded by the Cult of the Machine God. Was it a blessing or a curse?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal poursuit sur un ton altier.{/n} « Eschatos était l'arme idéale contre les créations de l'Omnimessie corrompues par nos ennemis... mais également contre Ses fidèles serviteurs. Son utilisation aurait tout aussi bien pu apporter la victoire à l'Imperium que le détruire. Eschatos pouvait signer la fin de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, car il pouvait parfaitement contrecarrer la puissance du culte du Dieu-Machine. Mais était-ce une bénédiction ou une malédiction ? »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal continúa el discurso de Susurro de latón con un tono arrogante.{/n} «Eschatos era el arma perfecta para usar contra creaciones del Omnissiah que habían sido corrompidas por los enemigos... pero también contra sus fieles sirvientes. Su uso podía significar la victoria del Imperium, o su destrucción. Eschatos pudo significar el fin del Adeptus Mechanicus, pues se presentaba como una solución ideal para contrarrestar el control del Culto del Dios Máquina. Pero ¿era esta una bendición o una maldición?».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal continues Brasswhisper's speech in a lofty tone:{/n} "Eschatos was the perfect weapon against creations of the Omnissiah that had been corrupted by enemies... but also against His faithful servants. Its spread could bring victory to the Imperium, or it could destroy it. Eschatos could spell the end of the Adeptus Mechanicus, for it was the perfect answer to the power wielded by the Cult of the Machine God. Was it a blessing or a curse?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal continúa el discurso de Susurro de latón con un tono arrogante.{/n} «Eschatos era el arma perfecta para usar contra creaciones del Omnissiah que habían sido corrompidas por los enemigos... pero también contra sus fieles sirvientes. Su uso podía significar la victoria del Imperium, o su destrucción. Eschatos pudo significar el fin del Adeptus Mechanicus, pues se presentaba como una solución ideal para contrarrestar el control del Culto del Dios Máquina. Pero ¿era esta una bendición o una maldición?».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal führt Messingflüsterers Rede in erhabenem Ton fort.{/n} "Eschatos war die perfekte Waffe gegen Schöpfungen des Omnissiah, die vom Feind verdorben worden waren ... doch auch gegen seine getreuen Diener. Seine Ausbreitung konnte dem Imperium den Sieg bringen oder es aber zerstören. Eschatos konnte das Ende des Adeptus Mechanicus bedeuten, denn er war die perfekte Antwort auf die Macht des Kults des Maschinengottes. War er ein Segen oder ein Fluch?"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal continues Brasswhisper's speech in a lofty tone:{/n} "Eschatos was the perfect weapon against creations of the Omnissiah that had been corrupted by enemies... but also against His faithful servants. Its spread could bring victory to the Imperium, or it could destroy it. Eschatos could spell the end of the Adeptus Mechanicus, for it was the perfect answer to the power wielded by the Cult of the Machine God. Was it a blessing or a curse?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal führt Messingflüsterers Rede in erhabenem Ton fort.{/n} "Eschatos war die perfekte Waffe gegen Schöpfungen des Omnissiah, die vom Feind verdorben worden waren ... doch auch gegen seine getreuen Diener. Seine Ausbreitung konnte dem Imperium den Sieg bringen oder es aber zerstören. Eschatos konnte das Ende des Adeptus Mechanicus bedeuten, denn er war die perfekte Antwort auf die Macht des Kults des Maschinengottes. War er ein Segen oder ein Fluch?"

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, Pirinçfısıltı'nın sözlerini azametli bir ses tonuyla sürdürüyor:{/n} "Eskatos, düşmanları tarafından yozlaştırılan Hermesih yaratımlarına karşı kullanılabilecek kusursuz bir silahtı. Ama O'nun inançlı hizmetkârlarına karşı da kullanılabilirdi. Yayılması İmparatorluk'a zafer de kazandırabilirdi, onu yok da edebilirdi. Eskatos, Adeptus Mechanicus'un sonu anlamına gelebilirdi çünkü Makine Tanrı Tarikatı'nın elinde bulundurduğu güce kusursuz bir yanıttı. Bir armağan mıydı yoksa bir lanet mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal continues Brasswhisper's speech in a lofty tone:{/n} "Eschatos was the perfect weapon against creations of the Omnissiah that had been corrupted by enemies... but also against His faithful servants. Its spread could bring victory to the Imperium, or it could destroy it. Eschatos could spell the end of the Adeptus Mechanicus, for it was the perfect answer to the power wielded by the Cult of the Machine God. Was it a blessing or a curse?"

Ama O'nun inançlı hizmetkârlarına karşı da kullanılabilirdi. Yayılması İmparatorluk'a zafer de kazandırabilirdi, onu yok da edebilirdi. Eschatos, Adeptus Mechanicus'un sonu anlamına gelebilirdi çünkü Makine Tanrı Tarikatı'nın elinde bulundurduğu güce kusursuz bir yanıttı. Bir armağan mıydı yoksa bir lanet mi?"
